column4: howdy , long time linux user here in a bad way with Sony Vaio and Nvidia 330M card. Took a while under lucid to get things right , now no matter what I do I cannot install the Nvidia after the 10.10 upgrade
I've tried nvidia-current after purging all nvidia from root shell , and Jockey does not see any Nvidia drivers , also I tried installing from the nvidia site but it gave kernel errors
anyone have a good link for installing nvidia drivers under 10.10 ? I'm having a hell of a time
